mapper.insert: insert into books(bk_id, bk_category, bk_title, bk_titlelang, bk_year, bk_price, bk_author, bk_logo) values (seq_book.nextval,#{bookCategory},#{bookTitle},#{bookTitleLang},#{bookYear},#{bookPrice},#{bookAuthor},#{bookLogo})
insert into books(bk_category, bk_title, bk_titlelang, bk_year, bk_price, bk_author, bk_logo) values (#{bookCategory},#{bookTitle},#{bookTitleLang},#{bookYear},#{bookPrice},#{bookAuthor},#{bookLogo})
